Package Ex1

Interface cont_function

  • All Superinterfaces:
    function, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Polynom_able
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Polynom
    public interface cont_function
extends function
    The interface represents a continuance function
    Author:
    Boaz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      double area​(double x0, double x1, double eps)
      Compute a Riman's integral from x0 to x1 in eps steps.

      Compute a value x' (x0<=x'<=x1) for with |f(x')| < eps assuming (f(x0)*f(x1)<=0, else should throws runtimeException computes f(x') such that: (i) x0<=x'<=x1 && (ii) |f(x')|

    • Method Detail

      • area

        double area​(double x0,
            double x1,
            double eps)
        Compute a Riman's integral from x0 to x1 in eps steps.
        Parameters:
        x0 - starting point
        x1 - end point
        eps - positive step value
        Returns:
        the approximated area above X-axis below this function bounded in the range of [x0,x1]

      • root

        double root​(double x0,
            double x1,
            double eps)
        Compute a value x' (x0<=x'<=x1) for with |f(x')| < eps assuming (f(x0)*f(x1)<=0, else should throws runtimeException computes f(x') such that: (i) x0<=x'<=x1 && (ii) |f(x')|
        Parameters:
        x0 - starting point
        x1 - end point
        eps - >0 (positive) representing the epsilon range the solution should be within.
        Returns:
        an approximated value (root) for this (cont.) function
